'''''Fungi Buster''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in various areas of [[Sumeru]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of angry Fungi has been sighted out in the wild, threatening the safety of nearby areas. Defeat them and put an end to this problem.}}
